article_title: Why Don't Republicans Have An Alternative To Obamacare?

article_metadata.description: The Affordable Care Act is one big mess. Even most Democrats know it’s a mess. It’s disliked on the left almost as much as it’s hated on the right. So you would think that Republicans would have a golden opportunity to offer an alternative. But they don’t have one.  They’re [...]
article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman
